description: Introducing the new Escalante 3. This Altra classic gets a style refresh with an all-new modern look. These design updates offer an improved fit for your foot with our updated, sock-like upper material and added elastic throughout. Versatility meet comfort with this road shoe favorite with our Altra EGO™ foam midsole and our Standard FootShape™ Fit designed to take you from your morning run to your morning meeting.
name: Altra Escalante 3 - Mens
